content: this legal text summarizes a court case that took place in bari on october 12 2015 the case number is 4276 but unfortunately the text does not provide any further information about the parties involved or the details of the case the case is related to a principle competition and spans over a period of 18 years from 1997 to 2015 the court has made a final ruling on an application brought by several individuals declaring the drawing shares of the estate of a person named f to be enforceable the court has assigned full exclusive ownership of certain properties to each of the individuals involved including land with almond groves olive groves vineyards and rustic properties additionally the court has ordered one individual to pay a settlement amount to another individual and another individual to pay a settlement amount to three heirs the court has also ordered the division of sums received from the sale of auctioned assets and from compensation for expropriation into four equal parts the costs of the proceedings and the experts report are to be paid by all parties involved the case involves a deceased person and their children with a holographic will from 1971 assigning certain funds to one son and excluding the other children from receiving any residual property the son who received the funds contested the value of the property donated to him in 1960 and requested the court to order a division of the remaining assets an expert witness was appointed to prepare a division plan and a partial judgment was issued in 2011 ordering the division of the estate the division was carried out through drawing lots and each child was allocated a share of the assets the court also considered two expropriated properties and the proceeds from their sale the expert witness determined the value of the property donated in 1960 and made calculations for the assignment of assets and cash balances the final analysis resulted in each child receiving a certain sum of money and assets the parties agreed to the division project and the costs of the proceedings and the experts report were fully offset in the final ruling the court declared the shares of the estate of a person named f to be enforceable they assigned full ownership of specific pieces of land to different individuals and also ordered settlement amounts to be paid between certain parties the court further ordered the division of sums received from the sale of assets and compensation for expropriation into four equal parts the costs of the proceedings and the experts report are to be paid by all parties involved this decision was made on october 6 2015 in bari
